name: Dads
overview: Two successful guys in their 30s have their lives turned upside down when their nightmare dads unexpectedly move in with them.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: Eli and Warner are business partners - and childhood best friends - whose lives get turned upside down when their pain-in-the-neck dads, David and Crawford move in with them.

episodes.name: Heckuva Job, Brownie
episodes.overview: Ghost Child Games is in need of a new video game concept. So Warner and Veronica encourage Eli to revert to his tried-and-true method of coming up with ideas: “medicinally enhanced” baked goods. But the guys discover an even better use for the treats when their pain-in-the-neck dads, David and Crawford start eating them and totally mellowing out.

episodes.name: Clean On Me
episodes.overview: Warner borrows Edna from Eli, making Eli realize he needs to start treating her better; Veronica hires Crawford.

episodes.name: Funny Girl
episodes.overview: Eli dates Veronica's friend Anne, an attractive but annoying comedian, with Eli having her move in to spite David. Meanwhile, a recording session for the company's new video game "Occue-Die Wall Street" gets out of hand when Crawford tries to help Warner with some "businessman" voice-over work.

episodes.name: Oldfinger
episodes.overview: Concerned about their dads' health, Warner and Eli takes them to get physicals, but Warner begins to worry about his mortality when the doctor dies before giving him his test results.

episodes.name: My Dad's Hotter Than Your Dad
episodes.overview: Since Eli has a history of being a Human Resources liability, Warner hires Janet, an older woman as a new assistant at the office, but the plan backfires when David and Crawford compete for her affections.

episodes.name: Foul Play
episodes.overview: Eli and David are forced to sleep at the Ghost Child Games offices when bedbugs overtake the loft. Meanwhile, Camila gets the lead in a local theater production, and Crawford ends up being uncharacteristically helpful, much to the chagrin of Warner.

episodes.name: Doubles Trouble
episodes.overview: When Warner lets Camila be his partner for the Virtual Tennis Tournament, Eli starts to question their friendship.

episodes.name: Comic Book Issues
episodes.overview: Eli and Warner face an elder abuse investigation and their dads are placed in a care home.

episodes.name: Dad Abuse
episodes.overview: Eli and Warner mistakenly trigger an investigation of elder abuse, causing their dads to be placed in a foster care home. Eli and Warner's initial happiness soon turns into guilt, and they hatch a plan to rescue their fathers. Meanwhile, Crawford's childish, sloppy habits get between Camila and Warner.

episodes.name: The Glitch That Stole Christmas
episodes.overview: When Eli and Warner fire one of their employees right before the holiday season, the ex-game designer seeks his revenge by including an offensive word in their family-friendly Christmas game. Meanwhile, Edna encourages David to get a job as a mall Santa in order to earn enough money to buy Eli a gift.

episodes.name: Mister Edna
episodes.overview: When David gets Edna detained as an illegal immigrant, Eli forces him to marry her so that she can stay in the country.

episodes.name: Eli Nightingale
episodes.overview: When Veronica gets sick, germaphobe Warner forces her go home. Sensing an opportunity, Eli takes care of her in hopes that his kindness will make her want to sleep with him.

episodes.name: Bully Gene
episodes.overview: Eli gets bullied by the son of the woman he is dating; Gene steals a game prototype; Warner picks fights with Camila so he can sleep on the couch.

episodes.name: Baby Face
episodes.overview: When Camila goes out of town to visit her sister, she leaves Warner with his first family-free weekend in years – except for the fact that Crawford now lives with them. To solve the problem, Warner puts Crawford and David up in a hotel where the two are mistaken for a gay couple on their honeymoon.

episodes.name: Warner's Got It Made
episodes.overview: Warner and Eli invite a mob boss to the office to consult when they develop a new mafia game for Ghost Child Games.

episodes.name: Enemies of Bill
episodes.overview: When Crawford gets too drunk and accidentally ruins the Whittemores' couch, Camila insists that they all quit drinking so much. Then, Eli ignores David's constant complaining, and one of them ends up in the hospital for it.

episodes.name: Have a Heart... Attack!
episodes.overview: When Crawford gets too drunk and accidentally ruins the Whittemores' couch, Camila insists that they all quit drinking so much. Then, Eli ignores David's constant complaining, and one of them ends up in the hospital for it.
